title: Connect frontend views to backend API
description: Wire up React components to call backend API endpoints. Set up API client with error handling. Implement data fetching hooks.

title: Implement error handling and loading states
description: Add loading spinners, error messages, empty states. Handle network errors gracefully. Add retry logic for failed requests.

title: Final testing and bug fixes
description: End-to-end testing of all workflows. Fix any remaining bugs. Verify all task types and conditions work correctly. Test with sample CSV data.

title: Implement task generation from discharge date
description:
Create TaskGenerator service in src/server/services/taskGenerator.ts:

Generate tasks for each patient based on discharge datetime:
- contact_patient: 0-24hrs after discharge (all patients)
- medication_reconciliation: 0-48hrs (all patients)
- followup_scheduling: 0-48hrs (all patients)
- facility_handoff: 0-24hrs (only if dischargeDisposition === 'Skilled nursing facility')
- checkin_call: 48-72hrs (only if readmissionRiskScore in ['High', 'Very High'])

Calculate dueStart and dueEnd timestamps using dischargeDate + dischargeTime (default to 00:00 if no time).

title: Implement conditional task logic (SNF, high-risk)
description:
Implement conditional task filtering:

- facility_handoff: Check patient.dischargeDisposition === 'Skilled nursing facility'
- checkin_call: Check patient.readmissionRiskScore in ['High', 'Very High']

Both conditions should be evaluated when generating tasks for a patient. Tasks that don't meet conditions should not be created.

title: Implement time window calculations and overdue detection
description: Calculate time remaining for each task. Handle the 48-72hr window for check-in calls. Detect and flag overdue tasks.

title: Implement task status transitions and persistence
description: Handle task status changes (pending -> completed). Store completion timestamp and user. Persist task state to storage.

title: Create base UI components (Button, Card, Badge, Table)
description: Build reusable base components with simple flat design. Include Button variants, Card container, Badge for status indicators, and Table for data display.

title: Create task-specific components (TaskCard, TaskStatusBadge)
description: Build TaskCard to display task info with due date and status. TaskStatusBadge shows pending/completed/overdue with appropriate colors.

title: Create patient components (PatientCard, PatientHeader)
description: Build PatientCard for patient list display. PatientHeader shows patient details and risk level. Include discharge destination indicator.

title: Set up CSS styling and design system
description: Create base CSS variables for colors, spacing, typography. Implement flat design system. Set up responsive layout basics.

title: Set up Express server with TypeScript
description: Initialize Express server in src/server/index.ts. Configure middleware (cors, json parsing). Set up TypeScript compilation for server.

title: Implement patient API endpoints
description: Create routes for GET /api/patients (list all), GET /api/patients/:id (single patient with tasks). Support filtering by assistant.

title: Implement task API endpoints
description: Create routes for GET /api/tasks (list, filterable), GET /api/tasks/urgent, PATCH /api/tasks/:id (update status), GET /api/dashboard/stats.

title: Initialize Vite project with React and TypeScript
description: Set up the base Vite project with React and TypeScript template. Configure tsconfig.json for both client and server code.

title: Configure project structure (client/server/shared)
description: Set up the directory structure: src/client for React frontend, src/server for Node backend, src/shared for shared types. Configure path aliases.

title: Set up development environment with concurrent client/server
description: Configure npm scripts to run Vite dev server and Node server concurrently. Set up nodemon for server hot-reload. Add ESLint configuration.

title: Define shared TypeScript types (Patient, Task, TaskType)
description:
Create TypeScript interfaces in src/shared/types.ts:

Patient interface with 21 fields:
- Identifiers: patientId (MRN), patientName
- Demographics: dob, gender, phone?, email?, preferredLanguage
- Admission/Discharge: admissionDate, dischargeDate, dischargeTime?, lengthOfStay
- Clinical: primaryDiagnosis, dischargeDisposition, dischargeMedications, allergies?
- Care Team: attendingPhysician, pcpName?, pcpPhone?
- Risk: readmissionRiskScore, fallRisk?
- Other: notes?

Supporting types:
- DischargeDisposition: 'Home' | 'Home with home health' | 'Skilled nursing facility'
- RiskLevel: 'Low' | 'Medium' | 'High' | 'Very High'
- Task, TaskType, TaskStatus interfaces
- TaskRule type for task generation logic

title: Create CSV parser service
description:
Implement CSV parser service in src/server/services/csvParser.ts:

- Parse patient_data.csv with all 21 columns
- Handle nullable fields: phone, email, dischargeTime, allergies, pcpName, pcpPhone, fallRisk, notes
- Convert snake_case CSV headers to camelCase
- Parse dates (dob, admissionDate, dischargeDate)
- Parse time (dischargeTime as HH:MM or null)
- Convert lengthOfStay to number
- Validate required fields
- Handle special values: empty strings -> null, 'NKDA' for allergies
- Support file reload on change for development

title: Create patient data service with CRUD operations
description:
Implement PatientService in src/server/services/patientService.ts:

- getAll(): Return all patients from CSV
- getById(patientId: string): Get single patient by MRN
- In-memory cache with CSV file watching for updates
- Methods to support filtering/searching if needed

Note: This MVP is read-only for patient data (no CRUD writes to CSV).

title: Build Dashboard view with summary stats and urgent tasks
description: Create main dashboard showing total patients, pending tasks, overdue count. Display urgent tasks list (due within 4 hours). Quick navigation to other views.

title: Build Task list view with filtering
description: Create task list view showing all tasks. Add filters for status (pending/completed/overdue), task type, due date range. Support sorting by urgency.

title: Build Patient detail view
description: Create patient detail page showing patient info, discharge details, and all associated tasks. Display task timeline visualization.

title: Build task completion workflow
description: Implement the UX for marking tasks complete. Add confirmation dialog. Show success feedback. Update task list in real-time.
